name: Beyond Emancipation
description: Housing, education, employment, and life skills support for foster youth ages 16-24
fullDescription: Beyond Emancipation helps current and former foster youth in Alameda County transition to successful adulthood through housing, education, employment, and wellness support.
whatTheyOffer:
- Housing assistance and placement
- Education support and tutoring
- Employment training and job placement
- Life skills development
- Mental health services
- Financial coaching
- Ongoing case management
howToGetIt:
1. Contact Beyond Emancipation
2. Must be current or former foster youth ages 16-24
3. Must have connection to Alameda County
4. Complete intake assessment
5. Develop personalized success plan
6. Access comprehensive services
keywords: Beyond Emancipation, Alameda County, foster youth, former foster youth, ages 16-24, housing, education support, employment training, life skills, mental health
